content.name: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
content.content_html:
Descripción: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

Director: Zack Snyder

Actores: Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Amy Adams

content.name: Captain America: Civil War
content.content_html:
Descripción: Political interference in the Avengers' activities causes a rift between former allies Captain America and Iron Man.

Director: Anthony Russo, Joe Russo

Actores: Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr., Scarlett Johansson

content.name: Deadpool
content.content_html:
Descripción: A former Special Forces operative turned mercenary is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers, adopting the alter ego Deadpool.

Director: Tim Miller

Actores: Ryan Reynolds, Morena Baccarin, T.J. Miller

content.name: El libro de la selva
content.content_html:
Descripción: The man-cub Mowgli flees the jungle after a threat from the tiger Shere Khan. Guided by Bagheera the panther and the bear Baloo, Mowgli embarks on a journey of self-discovery, though he also meets creatures who don't have his best interests at heart.

Director: Jon Favreau

Actores: Justin Marks (screenplay), Rudyard Kipling (book)

content.name: Calle Cloverfield 10
content.content_html:
Descripción: After getting in a car accident, a woman is held in a shelter with two men, who claim the outside world is affected by a widespread chemical attack.

Director: Dan Trachtenberg

Actores: John Goodman, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, John Gallagher Jr.

content.name: The Revenant
content.content_html:
Descripción: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

Director: Alejandro G. Iñárritu

Actores: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hardy, Will Poulter

content.name: War Dogs
content.content_html:
Descripción: The true story of two young men, David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli, who won a $300 million contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan.

Director: Todd Phillips

Actores: Ana de Armas, Jonah Hill, Miles Teller

content.name: Zootopia
content.content_html:
Descripción: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

Director: Byron Howard, Rich Moore

Actores: Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman, Idris Elba

content.name: Daddy's Home
content.content_html:
Descripción: Stepdad, Brad Whitaker, is a radio host trying to get his stepchildren to love him and call him Dad. But his plans turn upside down when the biological father, Dusty Mayron, returns.

Director: Sean Anders

Actores: Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Linda Cardellini
